content.rendered:
One of the Luxe ‘homegrown’ talents, Brody started his career under the watchful eye of Reuben and the other salon mentors. Being educated within our education programs, Brody has developed his skill set to be one of our brightest and creative talents. Brody has elevated his craft through sheer determination and perseverance in learning & being taught by some of the industries leaders in both cutting and colouring.

His colours are technically advanced and his cuts are fresh & classic, his blow dries keep our guests coming back for that “what women want look”, sexy and long lasting, which has started to gain him a burgeoning and loyal clientele within Luxe.

“My go to favorites are beautiful blondes & balayage, accompanying messy long bobs or long layered haircuts – think textured natural beachy hair with rich & creamy colours. Maintaining the hair’s condition is one of my main priorities. To finish there is nothing I love more than a strong, sexy blow dry – making my clients step out of my chair feeling beautiful”

Availability: Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday & Saturday.

excerpt.rendered: Brody’s colours are technically advanced and his cuts are fresh & classic, his blow dries keep our guests coming back for a sexy and long lasting look.
